author: The Wall Street Journal
description:
Epic Systems is the leading provider of electronic medical records in the U.S.—but its headquarters in Wisconsin looks nothing like a typical tech campus. The HQ has five different campuses and some take cues from stories like ‘Harry Potter,’ ‘The Wizard of Oz’ and ‘Alice in Wonderland.’ There are features like treehouses, yellow brick roads and even air-tagged sheep. WSJ visited Epic’s HQ to figure out why this medical record company built its version of Disneyland in Wisconsin. 

#Epic #Office #Shorts
title: A Day Inside a Disney-Inspired Fantasyland Office in Wisconsin
